name: Gas Stove with Kitchen Cabinet
description:
Client is a single mother with four children in a one-room rental flat. She had brought them up singlehandedly without any support from her ex-husband and is supporting three of her children's ITE education by doing parcel delivery.
Client's gas stove is spoilt; can only use one hob at a time. Appealing for a new stove with a kitchen cabinet that acts as a kitchen countertop. The cabinet should ideally be bigger than the hob so that client can place dishes on it as she does not have any other countertop in the kitchen.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Muhammad Danial Bin Mazlan

name: Induction Cooker
description: One of my clients ( 52 years old female) currently staying in our shelter (New Hope Shelter) is about to shift to her HDB 1 rm rental flat. She is facing financial hardship to buy home appliances as she is doing part time work and has no family support. If anyone can support this item, please contact Sunil Varghese @ +65 91001491 (whatsapp/sms/call) or email sunil@newhopecs.org.sg. She is also hope donors can support the delivery of the items as well. Thank you in advance for supporting our client.

name: Washing Machine
description: One of my clients ( 52 years old female) currently staying in our shelter (New Hope Shelter) is about to shift to her HDB 1 rm rental flat. name: Washing Machine
description: Client in her 70s, staying alone in rental flat and suffered from multiple medical conditions. Requires washing machine as she currently do not have one. Requires installation and delivery.

name: Refrigerator
description: Client is a single mother with 2 y/o daughter who has just been granted a public rental flat. She has low family support as they are estranged. She needs help in getting a refrigerator for the new flat. As this is a Muslim family, they prefer it comes from a Muslim family if it's second-hand, unless donor is keen to donate a new one.

name: Washing Machine
description: A family with 4 young children with developmental delays needs a washing machine. The husband is too sick to work and the wife is the sole breadwinner and main caregiver.

name: Fridge
description: Family of 7 living in a 2-room rental flat is requesting for a fridge (preferably halal). Thank you very much.

name: Refrigerator
description: Family of 12 with 10 children require a new fridge as theirs has broken down. They require a fridge to store food items for cooking. Being able to store items in bulk and cook would significantly reduce their financial expenses and allow them to meet their basic needs stably.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Lum Yi

name: handheld Vacuum Cleaner
description: User is an elderly man living in a rental flat whose employment has been affected significantly due to covid-19. His vacuum cleaner has spoilt previously and has difficulties in cleaning his house. The vacuum cleaner would benefit the user greatly. Preferable for the vacuum cleaner to be light as the user is an elderly man and would struggle to move around a heavy Vacuum cleaner.

name: Washing Machine
description: A single mother of 2 teenage boys requires a washing machine for their laundry needs. Their current washing machine has been in use for more than 5 years and is currently leaking at the bottom. The trio is currently subsisting on financial assistance and cannot afford to repair or purchase a second hand washing machine as the amount will greatly set back their finances. Donation of a washing machine will greatly assist them. Family is not particular on the type of washing machine as long as it is still functioning. Front load or top load also can.

name: 1x Front Load Washing Machine
description: Single father raising a child with special needs. Urgently in need of 1x Front Load Washing Machine. Appreciate for delivery to be arranged and covered by donor to client house. Thank you!

name: Washing Machine
description: Family has 3 young children, and there is only one parent who is the sole breadwinner. Family income is barely sufficient for the family and hence, the family has difficulties purchasing a washing machine.

name: Instant shower heater
description: Family with 2 young children. Husband is seeking for employment whereas client is the caregiver to her children. Family's shower heater is faulty. Couple has been showering with cold water.

name: Fridge
description:
This is a newlywed couple who are expecting their first child. 
After struggling to find a stable home, they are finally moving into their new rental flat. 
However, they are going through financial difficulties. 
Client is unable to afford the abovementioned item. 
Looking for a kind donor to help this family. 
Thank you.

name: Washing machine

name: Food Rations
description: Client is a 56-year-old man is living with his teenage son. They are facing financial constrains as client is suffering from several medical conditions. He would need some support with his groceries. 1. Chicken wings 2. Light Soya Sauce 3. Dark Soya Sauce 4. Canned Sardines x2 5. Cooking Oil 6. Maggi noodles 7. Dried Mifen 8.Xiao Bye Chai

name: Dry Food Ration
description:
A young couple is currently homeless and is working very hard to manage their situation. Due to their current circumstance, they are having difficulty meeting their basic needs. Hence, they will greatly benefit from the food ration during this tough period.

We are looking at 1 month supply of halal-certified dry food ration. 

We really appreciate your help. Thank you.

name: Food Rations
description:
Requesting halal food rations for needy families who may not have money to buy food Items due to financial issues 
Items needed such as - 
60x Halal Can Food [Meat -Sardine/Chicken etc] / [Vegetarian – Corn/Mushroom etc]
30x Packets of 3-in-1 beverage  (Milo/Horlicks/tea/coffee)
10x Bottle of Cooking oil (1L)
10x Packets of Salt & Sugar
Soya Sauce (Light / Dark)

Any amount is appreciated! Please call / email me before making any purchase as we have space constraint issues. Thank you!

name: Abbott Similac Follow On Milk Formula, Stage 2
description:
The family is faced with multiple transitions in the recent months and would benefit from support to provide caregiving to the infant. Thank you. 

Interested donors kindly contact: Joyce Gee 6978 3601 joycegee@carecorner.org.sg

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Juanna Sia

name: Spectacles for Low Income Family
description: A large family with 8 children, having difficulty making ends meet. Mother and a son have been experiencing blurry vision and require spectacles prescriptions. Vouchers for Spectacles are preferred.  Interested donor, please contact worker at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you very much!

name: Mini Fridge
description: 49 y/o clt is facing financial constraints and seeking employment for himself. He requires a new mini fridge as his previous one had spoilt.

name: Halal Food Rations
description: Client, husband and 2 children ages 2 years old and 5 months old are lodging with their family members. Client is the main caregiver to her two children. Client is unemployed, while husband does not have a stable source of income. The family struggles to make ends meet. Family is seeking assistance for food rations such as wet and dry ingredients, as well as a few tins and packets of milk (Dulac/Dupro Stage 3-4 and Dulac Stage 1) and diapers (Drypers XL Tape and Drypers M Tape). For further enquiries on delivery address etc, please contact me at 98598768, thank you very much.

name: Ensure Liquid (Strawberry Flavour)
description:
Patient is a 79 year old male who is married with a son. He requires assistance with his Activities of Daily Living (ADLs). Patient’s son is unemployed as he is the main caregiver for patient.
 
Patient was recommended by hospital to consume 2 cans of Ensure Liquid daily to supplement his diet. The family has difficulty affording the ongoing medical consumables due to son’s unemployment. 
The item can be found here: https://rehabmart.com.sg/nursing/nutrition/wellness-nutrition/ensure-liquid-strawberry (Rehab Mart) or https://www.pinkpharm.com/products/ensure-liquid-250ml?_pos=1&_sid=62c0a0f5d&_ss=r (PinkPharm). 

Kindly arrange for the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can WhatsApp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

name: Food rations
description: Hi there, I am looking for a kind donor to donate food rations for a family of 5. If you are keen, please email me and I will give you the list of food requested by the family. Thanks in advance.

name: Eureka Books
description: Single mother with 2 school-going children requires Eureka books (part1,2&3) for primary school.  Please contact social worker Christopher.  Thank you

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

name: Need Pediasure TripleSure Milk Powder
description: The Child is unable to take solid food and depends on the milk powder for nutrients.  He needs 10 tins of 850g of Pediasure TripleSure Milk Powder every month.   Items will be directly delivered to beneficiary's and please contact us for delivery details. (Email: dik@childrensociety.org.sg; Contact No.: 9436 7401; Point of Contact: Ms Peng Hui). Every little donation makes a big difference and thank you for your kind support!

name: NAN OPTIPRO HA 1
description: Couple has recently welcomed a new born. Father of the child works as a grab delivery man but but due to low income, the couple has difficulty sustaining the needs of the new born child. Client has requested for milk powder - NAN OPTIPRO HA 1.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Hannah Lim

name: Ensure Milk Vanilla
description: Client with a physical disability. She drinks Ensure Life milk Vanilla for nutrition daily. She would need a carton of Ensure milk for a monthly supply.

description: Client requires a laptop for her husband who needs it for a course he's attending to upgrade himself. Family is unable to afford purchasing one due to tight financial situation.

name: Laptop
description: Client is a single mother caring for her school going child. She is working from home and her laptop is wearing out, making it difficult for her to do her administrative work. She is requesting for a new or 2nd hand laptop replacement.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Shannon Ong

name: Laptop (For school usage)
description:
Young adult with mild ID is currently doing her part-time studies in digital animation at the ITE. She requires a laptop for her school work. Young adult is residing and taken care by her grandparents who are no longer working.

Min specifications required to support the necessary educational software: Processor: Intel(R) Core (TM) i7-8550U CPU @ 1.80GHz 1.99 GHz RAM: 16GB System type: 64-bit operating system, x64-based processer Software: Windows 10

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Lee Yan Jun

name: Laptop
description: Family of 5, with 2 children in Primary School, requires at least 1 laptop for their online home-based sessions as well as tutoring sessions. The client's spouse is not able to work due to medical issues and the family lost a substantial amount of income. Family now depends on client's income as the sole breadwinner. They are currently using the client's phone for their tutoring sessions. The donation will greatly reduce the financial stress on the couple. Item donated can be sent directly to FSC.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Siti Raudhah Bte Azman

name: Laptop
description: Client is a single mother and just gave birth. Client would like to request a laptop so she is able to do some part-time online job while providing care to her baby. Thank you. (Xin Mo)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Laptop
description:
Client is currently attending a course to upgrade herself to pursue her dreams to be an early childhood educator, while caring for 4 young children. 
Family does not have a laptop and face financial challenges. 
A laptop is needed for client's course, and will also be helpful for the children if they need it for school.

name: First Aid Box with Lock / Small Cabinet with Lock

name: Large size dresses
description: Mdm Teo is a 64 years old client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). She has limited financial resources and could not afford to purchase more clothings. THKMC is looking for second-hand Large size dresses that she can wear at home and in the community. It will be great if donor is able to arrange delivery to client's place at Ang Mo Kio ave 5. Kindly call/whatsapp Emily Koh at 97245522 for more information, thank you.
